module.name: Custom Applications
module.description: Registry to add custom extensions and destinations that may be created and used so that the Extensions and Destinations Registry can include these.
module.changelog: *13.0.5.1* FREEPBX-14599 :Using a amper character in a Custom Destination dial string *13.0.5* FREEPBX-11659 Custom Destination does not handle gosub args properly *13.0.4.3* Add sliding bootnav *13.0.4.3* FREEPBX-10209 htmlentities need to use UTF-8 *13.0.4.2* FREEPBX-9874 - fix variable names *13.0.4.1* Import from 12 *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9668 Multiple issues with Custom Extensions *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1* Visual Changes *12.0.2* FREEPBX-9234 Escape out the exception *12.0.1* Add advanced 'Return' function. *2.11.0.2* Add license info *2.11.0.1* Custom Application Popover Allowance *2.11.0.0* #6051 *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes
